thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Scott Sherriff
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Scott Sherriff

author: Scott Sherriff
title: Scott Sherriff
text:
My Japan Rail Pass arrived very quickly after I ordered it, and although it seems expensive it is much cheaper if you're travelling all over Japan. You are almost guaranteed that you will have to use it every day.
Once you arrive in Japan it is easy to activate the pass, there is an easy-to-find office at the airport where they take care of it for you and tell you everything that you need to know. Definitely worth it!
